mapper.select: select * from (select result1.*, rownum as rnum from (SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, board_cafe_comment.regdate, profile FROM board_cafe_comment INNER JOIN users ON board_cafe_comment.writer=users.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group DESC, num ASC) result1) where rnum between #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cafe_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
